entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 10:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets or freezing rain late in the morning then to flurries late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
